department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: The acquisition of various professional kitchen equipment for the Camp Vimy kitchen, including delivery
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Kitchen Equipment Camp Vimy
#### Solicitation Number: WS3934944883
#### Publication Date: March 28, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: May 2, 2023 (14:00:00)
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents: [Link to RFP Documents](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15833608?extsite=MTU4MzM2MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
#### Contact Information: [Please refer to below for contact information](#contact-information)

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of various professional kitchen equipment for the Camp Vimy kitchen, located at the Support Base in Valcartier, Quebec.

## Tender Details
- **RFP Title:** Acquisition of Professional Kitchen Equipment for Camp Vimy
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3934944883
- **RFP Publication Date:** March 28, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** May 2, 2023 (14:00:00)
- **Type of Tender:** Request for Proposal
- **Tender Status:** **Expired**
- **Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Logistics
- **Regions of Opportunity:** All of Quebec except National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Same as regions of opportunity

## Submission Requirements
- **Submission Deadline:** May 2, 2023 (14:00:00)
- **Late Submissions:** Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender announcement, please do not hesitate to contact Ioana Novac (SPAC/PSPC) at ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

---

 Time and Tide Waits for None. Your bid submission deadline is May 2nd, 2023 at 14:00:00 HAE. Kindly be on time to avoid having your bid declared non-responsive.  Good luck! 
* Format and colors used for better readability and aesthetics
